initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/testformoney');
escapeAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Hello! This is the Pretty Petal flower shop. Spreading flowers throughout the world!

pages.speaker: npc
lines: We sell flowers for your bases. Which ones would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: We sell flowers for your bases. Which ones would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: We sell flowers for your bases. Which ones would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: We sell flowers for your bases. Which ones would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: We sell flowers for your bases. Which ones would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Our flowers come in pairs of three. Would you like 3 Flower Pots for $260?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=260..}] run give @s minecraft:flower_pot 3');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=260..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=260..}] run scoreboard players remove @s Money 260');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');

lines: Lovely. And here you are. Happy decorating!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');
q.dialogue.close();

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Visit us again anytime!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');
